title: How does the Illuminati use mind control? - Quora

response.answer_text: We tend to use mind rays which we create by staring at our victims intently and concentrating hard. The only and I mean ONLY way to protect yourself is to wrap your head in a silver foil helmet . Many people favour the Costco “Kirkland” brand. Some people used to use metal buckets but the rays got in through the eye holes which clearly needed to be cut in to the bucket for health and safety reasons

Most people who write about this neglect the most powerful mind control of all: that willed by the subject themselves. MK-ULTRA’s most shocking secret was that torture and coercion do NOT produce effective mind control: sadists only do what scratches their sexual itch, not a coolheaded “interview”, people being tortured tell the operator what they think they want them to say, psychedelics and other drugs are about as effective in eliciting responses as the equivalent in alcohol (that is, disinhibition) and the notion of a “Manchurian candidate” was more of an intriguing theoretical than truth. Also remember that almost everything we know about the project came from the CIA itself, as the result of congressional hearings. The Modern Illuminati doesn’t subject people to mind control. It teaches it. That’s scary enough without all the edgelord creepypasta, I think.
